title: Activity Selection Problem
subject: Algorithms
theory:
Problem: Select max activities involving time intervals that don't overlap. 
Algo: Sort by **Finish Time**. Pick first. Skip anyone starting before current finishes.

examples.code:
(1,3), (2,4), (3,5)
1. Pick (1,3).
2. (2,4) overlaps 3. Skip.
3. (3,5) starts at 3. Pick.
Result: 2 activities.

exam_notes: O(n log n) due to sort.
